column3: News;Kandal:------ A surprise came when there were unexploded ordnance was discovered on a construction site.------The case occurred at 9:30 am on October 16
column7: Kandal province.------A man working on the foundations of a large building in the vicinity of Wat Sakthai
column8: reported to police that he had spotted an unexploded bomb and reported to the police.  CMAC have been requested to come out and deal with the device.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/379028------
